### Issue URL (Ads) [https://d3ward.github.io/toolz/adblock.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fd3ward.github.io%2Ftoolz%2Fadblock.html) ### Comment > I went to the URL (https://d3ward.github.io/toolz/adblock.html) attached with this issue report and found that 1 Samsung tracker was not blocked from loading. The expected outcome was that AdGuard would be able to block everything found on this page. ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.colamanhua.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.colamanhua.com%2F) ### Comment > 用了之后一直卡在这个页面，暂停之后就可以进去了 ### Screenshots

Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/wzHVh23.jpg)
